```{r}
X <- matrix(rnorm(1e6 * 100), 1e6, 100)
dim(X)
b <- rnorm(100)
y <- drop(X %*% b) + rnorm(1e6)
```

```{r}
system.time(b <- solve(crossprod(X), crossprod(X, y)))
```

```{r}
system.time(rowSums(X))
```

```{r}
Z <- matrix(rnorm(1e6 * 10), 1e6, 10)
```

```{r}
S <- rowSums(Z)
```

```{r}
system.time(t(S-t(Z)))
```
```{r}
system.time({
  matrix(S, nrow(Z), ncol(Z), byrow = TRUE)-Z
})
```
